name: Algal Growth (light-limited)
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Moderate growth matches local light regime, unless historically high/low (e.g., blackwater).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Visual percent cover or periphyton biomass

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thick blooms and scums that blanket the bed and trap fine sediment.
Criteria: Dense bloom or scum overshadowing substrate.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Broad patches of filamentous algae covering riffles.
Criteria: Large mats partially impair habitat.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Light filaments on sunlit margins.
Criteria: Slightly elevated algae coverage.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thin periphyton film on stable cobbles. No mats.
Criteria: Minimal algae. No nuisance mats.
